welcome_message_body: Welcome to Purwakarta, a charming city known for its rich cultural heritage and stunning natural beauty. We invite you to explore our vibrant markets, lush landscapes, and friendly community during your visit. Enjoy your time here!

restaurants.name: Bonjour Café
restaurants.description: Bonjour Café is a café located in Purwakarta.
restaurants.address: Jl. R.E Martadinata No 22, Purwakarta, Jawa Barat 41114

restaurants.address: Jl. K.K. Singawinata No.9 (Jl. Jend Sudirman - Jl. L.RE Martadinata), Purwakarta Sub-District, Jawa Barat 41114

restaurants.name: Bubur Ayam "Sampurna" Cianjur
restaurants.description: Bubur Ayam "Sampurna" Cianjur is a food truck located in Purwakarta.

restaurants.name: RM Sambel Hejo Sambel Dadak (ShSd)
